item.title: A resolution relative to the death of Joseph Robinette Biden, III.

latestAction.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S3728-3729; text as passed Senate: CR S3683)

item.title: On the passing of Joseph Robinette Biden, III.

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

item.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection. (text: CR H3904)
Passed/agreed to in House: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.(text: CR H3904)
Considered by unanimous consent. (consideration: CR H3904)
Mr. McCarthy asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

item.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

summary.text: Acknowledges with profound sorrow and deep regret the announcement of the untimely death of Joseph "Beau" Robinette Biden, III, son of Vice President Joseph Robinette Biden, Jr.

(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)

Acknowledges with profound sorrow and deep regret the announcement of the untimely death of Joseph "Beau" Robinette Biden, III, son of Vice President Joseph Robinette Biden, Jr.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
